item.title: Chirpy3D: Continuous Part Latents for Creative 3D Bird Generation
item.description: Chirpy3D: Generating creative, high-quality 3D birds with intricate details by learning a continuous part latent space from 2D images.

item.title: FAM Diffusion: Frequency and Attention Modulation for High-Resolution Image Generation with Stable Diffusion
item.description: FAM Diffusion: Generate high-res images seamlessly from pre-trained diffusion models, solving structural and texture inconsistencies without retraining!

item.title: Needle Threading: Can LLMs Follow Threads through Near-Million-Scale Haystacks?
item.description: Can LLMs effectively handle information spread across vast, almost million-scale datasets? This research investigates this question by evaluating 17 LLMs on novel ‚Äòneedle threading‚Äô tasks. These task…
